Groups.Group: Internet Security Benchmarks + Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 Level 1

Advanced.DetectScript: #!/bin/bash RV=0 servicename="talk" reason="The $servicename is not removed" rpm -q $servicename &>/dev/null if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then RV=1 fi if [ $RV -eq 1 ]; then echo "${reason}" >&1 echo "The $servicename should be removed" >&2 fi exit $RV

Vulnerability.Title: Remove talk
Vulnerability.Description:
The talk software makes it possible for users to send and receive messages across systems through a terminal session. The talk client (allows initialization of talk sessions) is installed by default.
Note: This content will only provide detection of the security threat or vulnerability. Remediation must be performed manually.
